text: The Château du Grand Verdus is a manor house in Sadirac, Gironde, Aquitaine, France. The château was built in the 16th century.French Ministry of Culture: Château du Grand Verdus ==Architectural significance== It has been listed as an official monument since 1978. ==References== Category:Châteaux in Gironde Category:Monuments historiques of Gironde
title: Château du Grand Verdus
